snippet.title: First Reveal Trailer | Legend to Reality | Black Beacon
snippet.description:
「 "See that tower standing tall like a beacon to the heaven?" 」
「 "Now, the tower is yours." 」

✦ As the tale has been told for a long time, there stands the tower that reached towards the heavens. 
Inside that tower lies a library that holds all the answers in the world. However, you will find everything but nothing you seek.

*Note: The English and Japanese voice recordings are in production.

Official Website: https://blackbeacon.astaplay.com/en/

#BlackBeacon #BB
